Namespaces, Organize your teams and projects


When you create an instance or a volume or a network or pretty much anything else, it always gets created in a namespace.
a namespace is a container for all your operational objects.

# List your current namespaces
$ digicloud namespace list

# Let's create a new namespace named awesome_ns
$ digicloud namespace create awesome_ns

# Now, in order to use your newly created namespace you need to select it
$ digicloud namespace select awesome_ns

# You can always check your currently active namespace using
$ digicloud namespace current

# You can invite others to your namespace as new members:
$ digicloud namespace member add awesome_ns  --email John@smith.me

# You can list your namespaces invitations by the following command:
$ digicloud namespace invitations list

# Remember you can manage your namespace via Web interface too: https://console.digicloud.ir/settings/namespaces
